line.comment: * automatically builds stations ordered by the player on client Outposts. Always homebased to an Outpost. Architect ship is a global variable, managed by ZH.Monitor
* ZH 1.2: never use more than 1/4 of your Outpost's allowed production queue
* the required station kit is ready for pick up
* ** ZH 1.2: don't order replacement station kits anymore
* if $qty > 1
* if we found a stockpile of station kits then we didn't craft that ourself and should order a replacement for what we take away
* if $pendingOrder
* dim $order = $pendingOrder, 1
* = [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.AddToBacklog' : outpost=[HOMEBASE] order=$order
* end
* end
* when we load up and go to place a station we can already start the next order
* ** ZH 1.2: don't order following station kit if already 1 ready in Outpost
* new crafting order
* Homebase is going to build what we need next. We should proceed to other clients and see if we have something ready for them
* Go to location
* we take 100 random positions in the sector and choose the closest one to the client
* Build
* clear the client's request
* needs a free support slot
* only 1 allowed per sector
* move any duplicate Research Station to the end of the Architect order queue
* if it was the only remaining order remove the client Outpost for now
* required asteroid available?
* if we don't have a matching asteroid we remove the order. There is a way to spawn new asteroids later with a generic mission, but this is just too rare.
* in between we need to check if the player has modified the Architect order queue

sval.val: Architect Error! Could not build station
Architect cannot build 2nd Research Station in
automatically builds stations ordered by the player on client Outposts. Always homebased to an Outpost. Architect ship is a global variable, managed by ZH.Monitor
ZH 1.2: never use more than 1/4 of your Outpost's allowed production queue
the required station kit is ready for pick up
** ZH 1.2: don't order replacement station kits anymore
if we found a stockpile of station kits then we didn't craft that ourself and should order a replacement for what we take away
when we load up and go to place a station we can already start the next order
** ZH 1.2: don't order following station kit if already 1 ready in Outpost
Homebase is going to build what we need next. We should proceed to other clients and see if we have something ready for them
we take 100 random positions in the sector and choose the closest one to the client
move any duplicate Research Station to the end of the Architect order queue
if it was the only remaining order remove the client Outpost for now
if we don't have a matching asteroid we remove the order. There is a way to spawn new asteroids later with a generic mission, but this is just too rare.
in between we need to check if the player has modified the Architect order queue
